snippet: Governor from 1959 to 1966, Mr. Reed was instrumental in starting educational television in Maine and oversaw the creation of what is now the University of Maine System.
abstract: John H Reed, who served as governor of Maine from 1959 to 1966, dies at age 91.
lead_paragraph: Governor from 1959 to 1966, Mr. Reed was instrumental in starting educational television in Maine and oversaw the creation of what is now the University of Maine System.

headline.seo: John H. Reed, 91, Former Governor of Maine
headline.main: John H. Reed, Former Governor of Maine, Dies at 91
headline.print_headline: John Reed, 91, Maine Leader With Hand in Education
